info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 22 at 6:43AM CDT until September 22 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southeast Minnesota, including the following counties, Dodge, Mower and Olmsted.
* WHEN...Until 945 AM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 641 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hayfield, Brownsdale, High Forest, Lansing, Rock Dell, Mayville, Dexter, Oslo, Waltham, Sargeant, County Roads 1 And 7, County Roads 1 And 15, Renova, County Roads 6 And 9, Highway 56 And County 6, County Roads 6 And 15, County Roads 3 And 108, Graves Landing Field, Interstate 90 And County 1 and County Roads 5 And 6. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT THIS MORNING

area.areaDesc: Dodge, MN; Mower, MN; Olmsted, MN
